name: "Ex Machina' by Brian K. Vaughan Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.correct: He can talk to and control machines
options: He understands how every single machine works
He can make machines out of nothing
questions.explanation:
He can talk to and control machines.

	Mitchell Hundred gained this power after having an alien artifact blow up in his face. Found at the base of the Brooklyn Bridge, the artifact has not been fully explained.

questions.text: How long did Mitchell Hundred spend as The Great Machine?
questions.explanation:
One year.

	Hundred decided he could do a better job as a public servant than as a lone vigilante. He won the mayoral race for New York City after saving thousands of people in the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.

questions.text: Hundred gained his powers after an explosion at the base of which bridge?
questions.explanation:
The Brooklyn Bridge.

	The Brooklyn Bridge was constructed in 1869, with construction finally ending in 1883. It also allows pedestrian travel as well as automobile.

questions.text: Hundred ran for mayor of New York City as a member of which political party?
questions.explanation:
Independent.

	Although Hundred's running partner Dave Wylie thought Hundred's candidacy would just hand the race to the Republican nominee, Hundred surprised everyone and won in a landslide victory.

Kremlin.

	Kremlin is first seen in one of Hundred's flashbacks, where he is a little kid at a voting center. Kremlin walks up to jokingly inform Hundred's mother that the voting system is corrupt. (Kremlin's real name is Ivan. His last name has not been revealed.)

questions.text: Hundred created two copies of a device that act as a fail-safe should he go mad with power. Which two people have these devices?
questions.explanation:
Kremlin and Bradbury.

	The design for the cyndrilical machine came to Hundred in a dream. Both Kremlin and Bradbury take the device, but Bradbury claims he could take Hundred down with his bare fists.

questions.text: What is Kremlin constantly seen with?
questions.explanation:
A cigarette.

	Although Kremlin has presumably been smoking since he knew Hundred as a young child, he has yet to show any negative or positive health effects from it.

questions.text: What is Hundred's distinctive physical trait?
questions.correct: He has scars from the explosion
options: He is blind in one eye
questions.explanation:
He has scars from the explosion.

	Hundred has scars on the left side of his face as a result of the explosion. They are shaped like electrodes, and seem to glow when Hundred uses his technopathy.

questions.text: Who killed several snowplow operators in the trade paperback "Ex Machina: The First Hundred Days"?
questions.explanation:
A high school student.

	An unnamed high school student got bomb-making instructions off the Internet. When confronted by armed police, he shot himself in the head.

questions.text: How did Kremlin keep an eye on Hundred?
questions.correct: A listening device on Hundred's tie
options: He used disguises to get close to Hundred
questions.explanation:
A listening device on Hundred's tie.

	Kremlin saw this as a protective measure, but Hundred understandably resented this. He punched Kremlin and gave him a nosebleed.
